data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Leblanc, Luc, Doorenweerd, Camiel, Jose, Michael San, Pham, Hong Thai, Rubinoff, Daniel (2018): Descriptions of four new species of Bactrocera and new country records highlight the high biodiversity of fruit flies in Vietnam (Diptera, Tephritidae, Dacinae). ZooKeys 797: 87-115, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.797.29138, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.797.29138
